items.label: ex-quadratic-fitness
items.title: Quadratic Fitness Landscape
items.content:
199: :label: ex-quadratic-fitness
200: 
201: The simplest example satisfying {prf:ref}`def-cg-fitness-landscape` is the **quadratic potential**
202: 
203: $$
204: \Phi(x) = \Phi_0 - \frac{\kappa}{2} \|x - x_0\|^2
205: $$
206: 
207: where $\Phi_0 \in \mathbb{R}$, $\kappa > 0$, and $x_0 \in \mathbb{R}^{d}$ is the unique global maximum. This potential has:
208: - Constant Hessian: $H_{\Phi}(x) = -\kappa I$
209: - Linear gradient: $\nabla \Phi(x) = -\kappa(x - x_0)$
210: - All higher derivatives vanish: $\nabla^k \Phi(x) = 0$ for $k \geq 3$

items.label: ex-canonical-confining-potential
items.title: Canonical Confining Potential
items.content:
279: :label: ex-canonical-confining-potential
280: 
281: A standard choice is the **smoothly regularized harmonic potential**:
282: 
283: $$
284: U(x) = \begin{cases}
285: 0 & \text{if } \|x\| \leq r_{\text{interior}} \\
286: \frac{\kappa}{2}(\|x\| - r_{\text{interior}})^2 & \text{if } r_{\text{interior}} < \|x\| < r_{\text{boundary}} \\
287: +\infty & \text{if } \|x\| \geq r_{\text{boundary}}
288: \end{cases}
289: 
290: $$
291: 
292: where $r_{\text{interior}} < r_{\text{boundary}} = \text{radius of } \mathcal{X}_{\text{valid}}$.
293: 
294: This potential satisfies all axiom requirements:
295: - **Coercivity**: $\alpha_U = \kappa$ (from quadratic growth)
296: - **Interior safety**: $F = 0$ for $\|x\| \leq r_{\text{interior}}$

279: :label: ex-canonical-confining-potential
280: 
281: A standard choice is the **smoothly regularized harmonic potential**:
282: 
283: $$
284: U(x) = \begin{cases}
285: 0 & \text{if } \|x\| \leq r_{\text{interior}} \\
286: \frac{\kappa}{2}(\|x\| - r_{\text{interior}})^2 & \text{if } r_{\text{interior}} < \|x\| < r_{\text{boundary}} \\
287: +\infty & \text{if } \|x\| \geq r_{\text{boundary}}
288: \end{cases}
289: 
290: $$
291: 
292: where $r_{\text{interior}} < r_{\text{boundary}} = \text{radius of } \mathcal{X}_{\text{valid}}$.
293: 
294: This potential satisfies all axiom requirements:
295: - **Coercivity**: $\alpha_U = \kappa$ (from quadratic growth)
296: - **Interior safety**: $F = 0$ for $\|x\| \leq r_{\text{interior}}$
297: - **Inward force**: $F(x) = -\kappa(\|x\| - r_{\text{interior}})\frac{x}{\|x\|}$ for $r_{\text{interior}} < \|x\| < r_{\text{boundary}}$

items.label: ex-fl-no-lsi
items.title: Random Walk on ℤ
items.content:
7129: :label: ex-fl-no-lsi
7130: 
7131: Consider a lazy random walk on the integers with transition:
7132: $$
7133: P(x, x \pm 1) = \frac{1}{4}, \quad P(x, x) = \frac{1}{2}
7134: $$
7135: 
7136: and stationary measure $\pi$ geometric: $\pi(x) \propto e^{-|x|}$.
7137: 
7138: **Has Foster-Lyapunov**: With $V(x) = |x|$:
7139: $$
7140: \mathbb{E}[V(X_{t+1})] \leq (1 - c)V(X_t) + C
7141: $$
items.raw_directive:
7126: **Foster-Lyapunov DOES NOT imply LSI** in general. Counter-example:
7127:

7134: $$
7135: 
7136: and stationary measure $\pi$ geometric: $\pi(x) \propto e^{-|x|}$.
7137:

7139: $$

7141: $$

items.content:
467: :class: tip
468: 
469: Consider a reward of the form:
470: 
471: $$
472: R(x, v) = f(\|x\|, \|v\|)
473: 
474: $$
475: 
476: on the ball $\mathcal{X}_{\text{valid}} = \{x : \|x\| \le R_0\}$. This system has **full $SO(d)$ rotational symmetry**.
